content: CFS-T SS transit frames Transit frames for fitting firestop modules to seal cable/pipe penetrations – can be welded to steel bulkheads and decks ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Cable transit frames and penetration sealing systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Available in corrosion-resistant coated steel and stainless steel Available with single- and multiple-frame windows in various sizes within single-row or double-row frames Part of a modular, easily modifiable cable transit system for sealing multi-cable transits (MCT) Applications Sealing penetrations in shipbuilding and offshore applications Sealing penetrations in wind power structures For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Cable diameter - range: 3 - 99 mm Temperature resistance range: -40 - 122 °F Free from: Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) Technical Data | Cable diameter - range | 3 - 99 mm | Temperature resistance range | -40 - 122 °F | Free from | Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) | Reaction to fire class (EN 13501-1) | E ### ITEMS- 2146055 - Transit frame CFS-T SS-2x1 MSP - Package Size 1 pc - 2146065 - Transit frame CFS-T SS-4x1 MSP - Package Size 1 pc - 2146076 - Transit frame CFS-T SS-6x1 S/S - Package Size 1 pc - 2262917 - Transit frame CFS-T SS-8+8x1 S/S - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-T SS 8+8x1 VA Firestop frame assy
